com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.stateful   
com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex This package contains the classes that are needed to apply regular expressions on character streams. 
com.googlecode.streamflyer.xml This package contains some classes to deal with infamous XML streams that contain characters that are allowed in XML 1.1 but not XML 1.0.

Classes in com.googlecode.streamflyer.experimental.range that implement Modifier
 class RangeFilterModifier
          This modifier deletes all data from the character stream that is not placed between the given start and end tag.

          Finds text that matches a given regular expression.
 

Uses of Modifier in com.googlecode.streamflyer.xml
 

Classes in com.googlecode.streamflyer.xml that implement Modifier
 class InvalidXmlCharacterModifier
          This modifier replaces invalid XML characters in an stream that contains an XML document.
 class XmlVersionModifier
          Replaces the XML version in the XML prolog with the given XML version.
